appStages.name: Introduction
appStages.stageDetails:
{ "components": [ { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Fraudulent Transaction Anomaly Detection

Overview

This app leverages AI/ML to detect and analyze fraudulent financial transactions. Using Isolation Forest for anomaly detection and LLM-powered RCA & insights, it helps risk, compliance, and customer service teams streamline fraud investigation workflows. All results are stored in SQL for secure retrieval, review, and editing.

Input

Users provide:

  • + Historical and real-time transaction data (invoices, payments, transfers)
  • + Supporting metadata (vendor details, approver, bank account, invoice time, amount, etc.)

Output

The app delivers:

  • +Detected anomalies and fraud-flagged transactions (via Isolation Forest)
  • +Root Cause Analysis (RCA) for each anomaly (e.g., duplicate invoice, odd hours, abnormal amounts)
  • +Actionable insights for risk mitigation and fraud prevention.
  • +Structured transaction tables saved to SQL, retrievable for review and editing
  • +Transaction-level fraud risk scores and recommended next steps

Benefits

  • +Faster Fraud Detection – Automated anomaly detection reduces manual effort.
  • +Explainability – RCA and insights explain why a transaction is flagged.
  • +Actionable Insights – Clear recommendations help teams prevent recurrence.
  • +Audit-Ready – SQL storage ensures secure, queryable history of fraud detection results.
  • +Enhanced Customer Service – Provides structured summaries and follow-up actions for fraud claims
  • +Scalable & Real-Time – Supports large volumes of transactions with consistent accuracy..
", "refreshOnChange": false, "key": "html", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Fraudulent Transaction Anomaly Detection Dataset

Field Name Description
Invoice_ID Unique identifier for the invoice/transaction record.
Vendor_ID Unique identifier of the vendor associated with the transaction.
PO_No Purchase Order number linked to the transaction.
Item Description or name of the item/service billed.
Qty_Received Quantity of goods/services received from vendor.
Qty_Billed Quantity of goods/services billed by vendor.
Hours_Logged Service hours actually logged for the work.
Hours_Billed Service hours billed by vendor.
Contract_Unit_Price Pre-agreed price per unit from vendor contract.
Unit_Price Price per unit billed on the invoice.
Invoice_Date Date when the invoice was issued.
Bank_Account Vendor bank account used for payment.
Approved_By Approver or authority who validated the invoice.
Delivery_Receipt_Flag Indicates if delivery receipt is attached (1 = yes, 0 = no).
Invoice_Amount Total billed amount of the invoice.
", "refreshOnChange": false, "customClass": "m-4 p-1", "key": "html2", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "
